data.prayer: Father, may the churches in Sahel, Burkina Faso honor local leaders who work hard for the flock of God.
data.verse: Pay careful attention to yourselves and to all the flock, in which the Holy Spirit has made you overseers, to care for the church of God, which he obtained with his own blood.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Sahel, Burkina Faso

data.prayer: Jesus, strengthen the church in Sahel, Burkina Faso by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Sahel, Burkina Faso today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide seekers in Sahel, Burkina Faso to the gospel through searching YouTube or TikTok today.
data.verse: I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Fulani, Jelgooji people. Make the Fulani, Jelgooji people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Spirit, encourage the disciples in Sahel, Burkina Faso to live with urgency and a passion for making more disciples.
data.verse: Yet you do not know what your life will be like tomorrow. you are just a vapor that appears for a little while and then vanishes away.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 102,451 believers in Sahel that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

data.prayer: Jesus, please find the broken hearted among the 968,400 souls in Sahel and mend their wounds.
data.verse: He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.

location.name: Sahel
location.people_groups_list: Gourma, Sininkere, Dogon, Jamsay, Mossi, Kurumfe, Fulse
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Gourma (1,084,000), Sininkere (11,000), Dogon, Jamsay (600), Mossi (9,980,000), Kurumfe, Fulse (318,000)
